channel.title: Posts on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Host Hugo on Github
item.description: 创建 .github.io 的代码仓库。 git submodule add -b master https://github.com/<USERNAME>.github.io.git public git add . && git commit -m “blog update” && git push open https://<USERNAME>.github.io to see your blog

item.title: Start Hugo Blog
item.description: 安装 hugo sudo pacman -S hugo 创建新站点 hugo new site blog 安装主题 cd blog git init git submodule add https://github.com/budparr/gohugo-theme-ananke.git theme/ananke echo 'theme = ananke' >> config.toml 添加第一篇博客 hugo new posts/my-first-post 查看效果 hugo server -D 然后打开浏览器，输入服务地址，就能看到效果啦。
